name: Calibre 10 Racing
description: Hit the starting grid in C10 Racing. An online competitive title that merges intense wheel-to-wheel racing action with first person shooter gameplay. 4 teams of 2, one driver & one shooter, go head-to-head using teamwork & strategy to capture the checkered flag.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Phenom II X4 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570, AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
